      • getSupportedAudioInputStreamFromInputStream

        public static javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getSupportedAudioInputStreamFromInputStream(java.io.InputStream pInputStream)
                                                                                        throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                                                               java.io.IOException
        retrieves a AudioInputStream from a given Inputstream. converts the AudioInputStream if needed
        Parameters:
        pSong - object from which the AudioInputStream should be retrieved
        Returns:
        a AudioInputStream-object from which can be played
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the given Song is not supported on the system
        java.io.IOException - if an underlying call throws it

      • getPCMSignedAudioInputStreamFromAudioInputStream

        public static javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getPCMSignedAudioInputStreamFromAudioInputStream(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream pAudioInputStream)

      • getPCMSignedAudioInputStreamFromAudioInputStream

        public static javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getPCMSignedAudioInputStreamFromAudioInputStream(java.io.InputStream pInputStream)
                                                                                             throws javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                                                                    java.io.IOException
        same as getSupportedAudioInputStreamFromInputStream(InputStream) but specifically always converts to PCM_SIGNED
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the Retrieval fails due to an I/O-Error
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the stream does not point to valid audio file data recognized by the system

      • getSupportedAudioInputStreamFromAudioInputStream

        public static javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream getSupportedAudioInputStreamFromAudioInputStream(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream pAudioInputStream,
                                                                                    boolean pAlwaysConvert)
        Ensures audio format support for a given stream. The Stream will be converted to the audio format PCM_SIGNED if one of the following conditions is true:
        • The stream's format is not supported on the system
        • pAlwaysConvert is true and the stream's format is not already PCM_SIGNED
        Parameters:
        pAudioInputStream - The audio stream to get a supported version of
        pAlwaysConvert - true to force a audio format conversion, false to perform it on an as-needed basis.
        Returns:
        The converted stream. If no conversion is performed, the input stream (pAudioInputStream) is returned.

      • getMixerInfo

        public static javax.sound.sampled.Mixer.Info getMixerInfo(java.lang.String pMixerName)
        Returns:
        a mixer info object belonging to the Mixer named as pMixerName or null if not found
